name: Corona Break(Beta)
description:
A downloadable game for Android.A top-down-shooter Arcade game. My first game using Unity 2D for Android.  created while at home just for fun.

The game is finished for now. But i'm glad to add more in the future. So I decided to put it in beta.  Feel free to leave a comment,  feedback, or ideas on how will i improve this game. 

Thanks for Playing!

Assets and Programming: Me

Sounds: BFXR

Music: Matthew(Brother)

Touch Pad : Unity Asset Store

Installation: 1. Download game 2. Install  3. Play :)
